features: SheaMoisture Coconut and Hibiscus Body Lotion is a non-greasy skin moisturizer that provides a burst of hydration for dry skin to make your skin soft, smooth and radiant
This hydrating body lotion is formulated with naturally derived coconut oil and shea butter - making it perfect for dull, dry skin
Our skin lotion provides nourishing moisturization to give you radiant skin that's smooth and irresistible to the touch
Our nourishing lotion for dry skin is blended with coconut oil and hibiscus flower, it helps restore moisture and leaves behind glowing skin with an addictive fragrance
Skin care products by SheaMoisture like this lotion for dry skin are made with Fair Trade Shea Butter; If you want glowing skin, this is the body lotion for you
Discover a body moisturizer lotion that's made with no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no propylene glycol, no mineral oil, no animal testing and no petroleum
body.description: SheaMoisture Coconut and Hibiscus Body Lotion is a non-greasy skin moisturizer that provides a burst of hydration for dry skin to make your skin soft, smooth and radiant! This hydrating body moisturizer, lotion, body cream and hand cream for dry hands is made from natural ingredients—making it perfect for dull, dry skin. Our skin cream lotion and shea butter hand cream provides nourishing moisturization to give you radiant skin and clear skin that's smooth and irresistible to touch! Coconut Oil and Sweet Hibiscus Flower restore moisture while imparting an addictive, natural fragrance to this skin moisturizer and body cream for women as well as a cream for men. Skin care products by SheaMoisture like this moisturizer for dry skin and lotion for dry hands is made with Fair Trade Shea Butter. If you want glowing skin, this is the body lotion for you. Discover a body moisturizer lotion that's made with no sulfates, no parabens, no phthalates, no propylene glycol, no mineral oil, no animal testing and no petroleum. Our Story; SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SheaMoisture Lotion- Coconut & Hibiscus This Coconut and Hibiscus lotion is the kind of quality skin care treatment you expect from our SheaMoisture line. Our skin-illuminating body lotion is made from a special lightweight Shea Butter formula that absorbs easily into the skin. Upon application, it brightens and evens out your skin tone while providing the level of deep moisturization your skin requires to remain healthy and vibrant. Coconut Oil and Sweet Hibiscus Flower restore moisture and improve the skin's firmness. The fragrance is also light and beautiful, imparting an addictive, natural aroma to this skin-pampering moisturizing blend.

Illuminating Body Lotion SheaMoisture's Coconut & Hibiscus Body Lotion is a non-greasy formula that gives dry, ashy skin a burst of healing hydration, helping to make your skin soft, smooth and oh-so radiant! It is a hydrating body care treatment made from natural ingredients and it's the perfect natural skin care solution for dry, sensitive skin. We pride ourselves on making good body lotion that helps make your skin look and feel soft and supple. And this is why we've added Songyi Mushrooms, which elevate this formulation to a whole other level, brightening dull skin and evening skin discoloration to make your skin look gorgeously radiant!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Feels like silk on your skin and has a nice coconut smell to it, but not that strong artificial coconut smell!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is completely organic and lacks any chemicals that are harmful to the skin. The scent lasts for days and keeps you moisturized throughout. This bottle lasts me very long too so it's set at a great value on amazon. I bought it online because it's cheaper than the stores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The smell this one has is nice and not too strong. It’s quite thick but still rubs in nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells WONDERFUL & not greasy
reviews.reviewText: I need a heavy lotion, but I can’t stand a greasy feel. This is my favorite lotion, although it’s so heavy, it’s hard to squeeze out of the bottle (that’s why we lose one star here). You have to unscrew the cap and bang it out, which can get messy. Should be sold in a tub instead, but it’s still the only body lotion I love, so I suffer. Always gets lots of compliments on the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this body lotion!
reviews.reviewText: This lotion is one of the best I've ever used. Better than the high priced ones. It's thick, luxurious and soaks into the skin quickly leaving it soft and smelling delicious. The scent isn't overpowering just a fresh, light scent of hibiscus. This is the lotion for me from now on. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick, moisturizing but not greasy. Smells wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So hard to squeeze out of the bottle. Viscosity issue. Smells good though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So moisturizing and not greasy
reviews.reviewText: I’ve purchased 2 so that I can have one in my bathroom and one in my bedroom. It’s a very clean lotion and smells great. I love this lotion
